title: 为什么会这样错误移动
txt_content:
装了superjump超级跳跃插件
每当落地时就返回原来的地方
这是为什么？
报错消息：

19.10 18:22:33 [服务器] 信息 20050221yan failed MOVEMENT_FLY Kick=No Ping=6 Check=airmotionchange MotionY=-0.5329328031078049 LastMotionY=-1.0827131053633714 CurrentLocation=[x=-1089.8733164180576, y=22.0, z=962.6572929283894, world=new, Block=AIR]19.10 18:22:34 [服务器] 信息 20050221yan failed MOVEMENT_FLY Kick=No Ping=6 Check=airmotionchange MotionY=-0.3934739376747025 LastMotionY=-1.1394588654330988 CurrentLocation=[x=-1093.8749999320132, y=22.0, z=962.9689471276132, world=new, Block=AIR]19.10 18:22:36 [服务器] 信息 20050221yan failed MOVEMENT_FLY Kick=No Ping=6 Check=airmotionchange MotionY=-0.3934739376747025 LastMotionY=-1.1394588654330988 CurrentLocation=[x=-1094.054508786234, y=22.0, z=962.8432384378517, world=new, Block=AIR]19.10 18:22:47 [服务器] 信息 20050221yan failed MOVEMENT_FLY Kick=No Ping=7 Check=airmotionchange MotionY=-0.8666395714037307 LastMotionY=-1.1270742591353908 CurrentLocation=[x=-1079.419429952053, y=23.5, z=972.705760971627, world=new, Block=AIR]19.10 18:22:49 [服务器] 信息 20050221yan failed MOVEMENT_FLY Kick=No Ping=6 Check=forceground OnGround=true MotionY=-0.1984042262909362419.10 18:22:51 [服务器] 信息 20050221yan failed MOVEMENT_FLY Kick=No Ping=6 Check=airmotionchange MotionY=-0.3934739376747096 LastMotionY=-1.1394588654330988 CurrentLocation=[x=-1082.634146115573, y=22.0, z=966.5834475522075, world=new, Block=AIR]19.10 18:22:52 [服务器] 信息 20050221yan failed MOVEMENT_FLY Kick=No Ping=6 Check=airmotionchange MotionY=-0.5329328031078049 LastMotionY=-1.0827131053633714 CurrentLocation=[x=-1085.9236662017693, y=22.0, z=969.4054340152818, world=new, Block=AIR]

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
ANC插件误报：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-610282-1-1.html
插件作者已经弃坑，原帖已经删除。
你可以找到它的重置版本：Advanced NoCheat Reload
不幸的是这个重置版本也被多次反馈BUG。
解决办法：删除ANC。
